column5: Ok ......We were in Dryden last year waiting to head to the Minnitaki when we heard these guys talking about the peelers in Dryden....WE THINK we know what they mean't but where were they talking about exactly?
I think they were referring to the local "Ballet ".
There's a potato processing plant on the corner of 17&665 just north of town. Best peelers this side of Prince Edward Island, or so I've been told.
